mapper.select: SELECT * FROM PLACE INNER JOIN BOARD USING(BRDNUM)
mapper.insert: insert into PLACE (BRDNUM, MCATNUM, SCATNUM, REGION, ADDR, TEL, MAPX, MAPY, URL) VALUES (#{brdNum}, #{mcatNum}, #{scatNum}, #{region}, #{addr}, #{tel}, #{mapx}, #{mapy}, #{url})
mapper.update: update place set mcatnum = #{mcatNum}, scatnum =#{scatNum}, region= #{region}, addr= #{addr}, tel=#{tel}, mapx=#{mapx}, mapy=#{mapy}, url=#{url} where brdnum = #{brdNum}
